name: Crypt Defense
description:
Crypt Defense is a fast-paced tower defense game. Play as a Necromancer, leading his friends in guarding their home against the humans and King Mortas.

Crypt Defense was made for VimJam 2.

Features

- Juicy low res pixel art in a paper-like 3D style.
- Utilize 4 different towers across 3 levels!
- 3 different minions and 3 different bosses to beat.

Instructions

- Click on the tower you want to place, then click on the tile you want to place it.
- Change camera angles with a and d or the left and right arrow keys.
- Click on an existing tower to open the sell menu.
